name: Christmas with Catapults!
description:
Merry Christmas, Richard!

This game was made for the 2022 Secret Santa Jam. Richard was my giftee. One of his favorite boyhood presents was a board game called "Crossbows and Catapults".

This is my gift to him and to everybody who remembers a special Christmas morning.

Credits
  • Coding, Art, Design by me, HugBug.
  • Music licensed from pond5.
  • Battle illustration from the original.
  • Sound effects from freesound.org: Huzzah, Bell, Victory 
An Ask From HugBug - This is an experimental WebGL 3D engine, and it might not work perfectly. :)

If you have trouble, please tell me about your browser, computer, and 3D card. THANKS!
